subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, the first Triple Crown champion in 37 years, became the eighth horse to win his next start after sweeping the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness and the Belmont.
snippet: American Pharoah, the first Triple Crown champion in 37 years, became the eighth horse to win his next start after sweeping the Kentucky Derby, the Preakness and the Belmont.
